TopicTitle: Kerbpaint And Customization mods not working in 1.1

Articles.Content:
Hi, i have an issue using Kerbpaint and other customizing mods on 1.1.3. I have these mods:

KJR, MechJeb2, Near Future Solar, PlanetaryBaseInc, RealPlume, SXT, Ven's StockRevamp, and zzRFstockalike along with Kerbpaint and Custom Tanx.

When i hover over a part and press "P" it gets highlighted, but the GUI does not open, nothing else happens. I can basically do everything but actually paint the part. BTW it was a stock, non-modded part other than Revamp.

On Custom Tanx, the editing area does not pull up.

Help
I have the same problem..............100% same
